content.new: I think [this video](https://youtu.be/UTId5SiyiFI) is pretty self-explanatory. The contact visualization is lagging behind quite significantly there (over 10 seconds at the end). I'm not aware of anything I did that could cause this. This is on Ubuntu 14

issue.title: Contact visualization sometimes lags behind significantly (~ 1 second and more)
